title: Cobalt City Christmas
description: When it comes to the holidays, Cobalt City isn't all that different from your hometown, except for the secret headquarters, out-of-town guests capable of destroying the world, hundreds of heavily armed rubber duckies, Christmas geese that fight back, other-worldly arsonists, and inventors with jet packs, that is.Unwrap a bundle of super-powered adventure for the holidays, including tasty tales from storytellers both new and Nicole Burns, Rosemary Jones, Angel Leigh McCoy, Jeremy Zimmerman, and Cobalt City creator Nathan Crowder. You've never experienced a Christmas like a Cobalt City Christmas!
author: Nathan Crowder
